articles.author: Jack Guy, CNN
articles.title: At least 197 children were fathered by sperm donor with cancer-causing gene. Some have already died - WLFI News 18
articles.description: A sperm donor with a rare genetic mutation linked to an increased risk of developing cancer fathered at least 197 children across Europe, some of whom have already died from
